conbody.p: This part prescribes acquisition policies and procedures for use in acquiring-

li.p:
(a)
Information technology, including financial management systems, consistent with other parts of this regulation, OMB CircularNo.A-127, Financial Management Systems and OMB CircularNo.A-130, Management of Federal Information Resources.
